load: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, role INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, email TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, token TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE DEFAULT '', password TEXT NOT NULL);

queries.auth.get: SELECT json_object('name', name) FROM users WHERE token = get_token();
queries.login.post: UPDATE users SET token = new_token(id, role) WHERE email = :email and password = :password;
queries.users.get.all: SELECT json_group_array(json_object('id', id, 'role', role, 'name', name, 'email', email)) FROM users;
queries.users.get.default: SELECT json_object('id', id, 'role', role, 'name', name, 'email', email) FROM users WHERE id = $1;
queries.users.delete.default: DELETE FROM users WHERE id = $1 RETURNING id;
queries.users.patch.email: UPDATE users SET email = :email WHERE id = $1 RETURNING id;
queries.users.post.default: INSERT INTO users (name, email) VALUES (:name, :email) RETURNING id;
queries.users.put.default: UPDATE users SET name = :name, email = :email WHERE id = $1 RETURNING id;
